scripts.prepare:sdk: mkdir -p tmp && cd tmp && git clone https://github.com/simpligility/maven-android-sdk-deployer.git && cd maven-android-sdk-deployer/ && mvn install -P 6.0 && ls ~/.m2/repository/android/android/
scripts.prepare:test-app: rm -rf tmp && mkdir -p tmp && cd tmp && git clone https://github.com/apache/cordova-app-hello-world.git && cd cordova-app-hello-world && mv template_src/* . && cordova platform add android && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-compat && cordova build
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:plugin
scripts.posttest: jsdoc -c jsdoc.json && jsdoc2md www/HotSpotPlugin.js | sed s/hotSpotPlugin/cordova.plugins.hotspot/g | sed s/HotSpotPlugin/cordova.plugins.hotspot/g > PLUGIN_USAGE.MD
scripts.jsdoc: jsdoc -c ./jsdoc.json -t ./node_modules/ink-docstrap/template -R README.md ./src && jsdoc2md www/HotSpotPlugin.js > ./dist/PLUGIN_USAGE.MD && cat ./dist/PLUGIN_USAGE.MD | sed s/hotSpotPlugin/cordova.plugins.hotspot/g | sed s/HotSpotPlugin/cordova.plugins.hotspot/g > PLUGIN_USAGE.MD
scripts.changelog:add: git add plugin.xml && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore(changelog): Updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.release:post: npm run version && npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post && git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run version-and-push
scripts.version-and-push: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm run publish-and-merge
scripts.publish-and-merge: git checkout master && git merge develop && npm publish && git push && git checkout develop
